title: Metro Clock style for Windows XP, Vista, 7 (32bit) works on x64
description:
This is a screen saver that has a picture rotation and a real time clock on it.  

From the original download:
Metro Clock V3
---------------------------


Using Metro Clock
----------------------
To install Metro Clock copy folder MetroClock and file Metro Clock.scr to C:WindowsSystem32,
then open screen saver selector and select Metro Clock

To uninstall Metro Clock delete folder MetroClock and file Metro Clock.scr from C:WindowsSystem32

To open settings go to screen saver selector and select Metro Clock and press settings button

.....................................................

A great screen saver.  The picture drops down over the desktop and the user has to click and drag it up like a manual garage door.
}Admiral Smith
